main event: On April 30, 1955, a round object the size of a dime was observed traversing the sky at tremendous speed with highly erratic movements.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes,The object maneuvered with incredible speed and sharp turns,The object was initially categorized as a possible balloon,Comments suggested that visual searchlight activity may have caused the sighting,The sighting involved reports from the Air Force as well.
